name: TTW Practitioners Hub (Explainability)
description: A partial assurance case for the TTW Practitioner's Hub. The assurance case focuses on the goal of explainable AI.

goals.name: G1
goals.short_description: Predictions made by the AI system are explainable to end users.

property_claims.name: P1
property_claims.short_description: The AI system utilises inherently interpretable models.
property_claims.long_description: The digital twin utilises inherently interpretable models.

property_claims.name: P1.1
property_claims.short_description: The models employed are transparent and understandable (e.g., decision trees, linear models).
property_claims.long_description: The models employed are transparent and understandable (e.g., decision trees, linear models).

property_claims.name: P1.2
property_claims.short_description: The decision-making processes of the models are easily traceable and explainable.
property_claims.long_description: The decision-making processes of the models are easily traceable and explainable.

property_claims.name: P2
property_claims.short_description: The system provides mechanisms for model interpretation.
property_claims.long_description: The system provides mechanisms for model interpretation.

property_claims.name: P2.1
property_claims.short_description: The system includes visualisation tools to illustrate how outputs are derived.
property_claims.long_description: The system includes visualisation tools to illustrate how outputs are derived.

property_claims.name: P2.2
property_claims.short_description: The system offers explanations in natural language.
property_claims.long_description: The system offers explanations in natural language.

property_claims.name: P2.3
property_claims.short_description: Interactive tools allow users to explore model predictions (e.g. counterfactuals).
property_claims.long_description: Interactive tools allow users to explore model predictions (e.g. counterfactuals).

property_claims.name: P8
property_claims.short_description: Explanations are accessible to users with varying levels of technical expertise and abilities.
property_claims.long_description: Explanations are accessible to users with varying levels of technical expertise and abilities.

property_claims.name: P8.1
property_claims.short_description: The system's explainability interface is compliant with accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG).
property_claims.long_description: The system's explainability interface is compliant with accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG).

property_claims.name: P3
property_claims.short_description: The project maintains comprehensive and accessible documentation.
property_claims.long_description: The project maintains comprehensive and accessible documentation.

property_claims.name: P3.1
property_claims.short_description: Documentation includes detailed descriptions of model algorithms and their purposes.
property_claims.long_description: Documentation includes detailed descriptions of model algorithms and their purposes.

property_claims.name: P3.2
property_claims.short_description: Data sources, collection methods, and preprocessing steps are transparently reported.
property_claims.long_description: Data sources, collection methods, and preprocessing steps are transparently reported.

property_claims.name: P4
property_claims.short_description: Decision-making processes within the project are transparent.
property_claims.long_description: Decision-making processes within the project are transparent.

property_claims.name: P4.1
property_claims.short_description: Rationale for key design and development choices is documented and available to relevant stakeholders (e.g. end users).
property_claims.long_description: Rationale for key design and development choices is documented and available to relevant stakeholders.

property_claims.name: P4.2
property_claims.short_description: Updates and changes to the system are communicated promptly to relevant stakeholders.
property_claims.long_description: Updates and changes to the system are communicated promptly to relevant parties.

property_claims.name: P5
property_claims.short_description: Accountability for the system's outputs is embedded in project governance.
property_claims.long_description: Accountability for the system's outputs is embedded in project governance.

property_claims.name: P5.1
property_claims.short_description: Specific roles are assigned responsibility for ensuring the explainability and validity of outputs.
property_claims.long_description: Specific roles are assigned responsibility for ensuring the explainability and validity of outputs.

property_claims.name: P5.2
property_claims.short_description: Regular reviews and audits are conducted to assess and improve explainability practices.
property_claims.long_description: Regular reviews and audits are conducted to assess and improve explainability practices.

property_claims.name: P6
property_claims.short_description: End users are actively involved in the design, development, and deployment stages.
property_claims.long_description: Stakeholders are actively involved in the design, development, and deployment stages.

property_claims.name: P6.1
property_claims.short_description: End users participated in focus groups to inform the structure and format of explainability mechanisms.
property_claims.long_description: Stakeholders and end users participated in focus groups to inform the structure and format of explanations.

property_claims.name: P6.2
property_claims.short_description: User studies determined that the end users are able to understand and explain the AI system's behaviour and outputs.
property_claims.long_description: User studies determined that the end users are able to understand and explain the AI system's behaviour and outputs.

property_claims.name: P7
property_claims.short_description: Feedback mechanisms have been established for end users.
property_claims.long_description: Feedback mechanisms have been established for stakeholders and end users.

property_claims.name: P7.1
property_claims.short_description: Invalid or inappropriate explanations can be flagged for review and investigation.
property_claims.long_description: Invalid or inappropriate explanations can be flagged for review and investigation.

property_claims.name: P7.2
property_claims.short_description: Insights from user studies are used to refine and enhance future explainability features.
property_claims.long_description: Insights from user studies are used to refine and enhance future explainability features.
